rules_text:
Vigilance
When Seraphic Ceratinia enters the battlefield, put a stun counter on each tapped creature and artifact.
{W}{W}{W}: Return Seraphic Ceratinia from your graveyard to the battlefield transformed.
rules_text2:
When Ceratinia's Grave enters the battlefield, untapped creatures and artifacts you control gain hexproof until end of turn.
{4}, {T}: Transform Ceratinia's Grave. It gains “When this card would be put into a graveyard from anywhere exile it instead.”
